testcase.name: Add a new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch chrome Browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email "admin@yourstore.com" and password "admin"............passed And Click Login button......................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User clicks customers Menu Item........................................passed And customers menu item.....................................................passed And User click Add new button...............................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter details in Add a new customer...............................passed And clicks Save button......................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully".passed And close browser...........................................................passed
